name: Quick Getaway
description:
Welcome back, Agent. You have been selected for the following mission. Help Agent Hotman avoid possible threats as he drives the G7 Exploratorem down the coast roads in a patrolling manner.

Music by Niall Stenson

Drive as fast as possible and avoid obstacles in the limited time available.

Hold the spacebar or click on the bottom of the game screen and hold down to accelerate, and use the left and right arrow keys or click on either side of the screen and hold down to steer the car.
